nodes.text: This individual was General Jaron Kyte's contact with the Cavrilhu Pirates. Any information that Kyte needed to relay to the Pirates went through this individual. In 19 ABY, Kyte sent a communication, informing his contact that Admiral Gilad Pellaeon had possibly learned of an arrangement between the Pirates and Moff Vilim Disra of the Braxant sector which saw the Pirates supplying the Imperial Remnant with Preybird-class starfighters they constructed using a production facility they had acquired.
